lines.text: [last lines]
Thunderbirds are go!

[Alan wants to use the Thunderizer to escape]
But Alan, this equipment is only to be used in case of an emergency!
[Tintin and Alan look at him]
I guess this qualifies!
Oh, and England won the footbal last night
YES! EN-GER-LAND!
Keep backing up... I've got a plan.
[Alan pulls out a rock catapult, aims it at The Hood and misses]
That's your plan?
It's not me you're angry at, Alan.
It's not you I'm aiming at.
[He shoots again hitting the console behind the Hood. The floor beneath Alan, TinTin and Fermat collapses]
Ahhhhhh
Get Them!
So, do you still think that science can explain everything?
Not girls.
Isn't life fun sometimes?
Rib ticklin', M'Lady.

[after Transom hits her fingernails with a broom]
Ow!
[slightly annoyed]
Do you know how much a manicure costs these days?
Fu-fu-nno way.
[first lines]

From a secret island in the South Pacific, the courageous Tracy family run an organization called International Rescue. When disaster strikes anywhere in the world, they are always first on the scene. They go by the name they gave they're incredible machines. The Thunderbirds. 5 - 4 - 3 - 2 - 1 - Thunderbirds are GO!

[controlling Brains telepathically]
Like a puppet on a string!
And they should do something about that hideous hammock.
Hey, Dad. That stuff the Hood said, about you leaving him to die. He was lying, right?

No. See, you can't save everyone, Alan. It doesn't matter how hard you try or how brave you are. It doesn't even matter if it's someone you love, someone you'd give your life in a second to save. You just can't save everyone.
What was Mom like?
She was a lot like you.

[arriving at Tracy Island after they send the emergency signal]
This doesn't look good, Parker.
No, Milady.

[points with her pink umbrella to a potted plant on a nearby table]
That Bougainvillea is absolutely parched!
[points behind her to an old wooden hammock]
And someone should do something about that *hideous* hammock!

[after taking Lady Penelope's unbrella]
Yes, milady.

[to Alan]
We make quite a team. It's hard for me to t-t-talk. It's hard for you to l-l-listen.
Mr Tracy. How kind of you to come back from outer space, Alan. I trust re-entry wasn't too rough.
Man, I haven't seen that much fire since that volcano in Fuji.
That wasn't Fuji; that was Istanbul!
No, no, Istanbul was the earthquake!
Who will rescue the rescuers?
Haven't you got homework to do or something

[after Fermat and Alan discovers Tintin watching them halfnaked]
You are worse than two girls!
Just because I s.s.stutter, doesn't mean that I'm wrong. If we're a team, we should make decisions as a team!

[unhappy]
Alan's back...

[faking a smile]
Oo Alan's back...
[changing the subject]
hey dad!
AAAAHHHHHH!
gee Alan... I never figured you for a crybaby
I'm gonna kill you
What did he say?
I think it some sort of apology...
[Lady Penelope is being carried off by The Hood's minion, Mullion]
Put me down! This outfit is couture!

[twirls around in her new dress]
So, what do you think?

[watching Fermat after seeing him swim]
He's getting there.
[looks at Tintin]
Whoa, Tintin! You're just really... um... blossoming!

[disgusted and shocked at the same time]
Eww! Did you say "blossoming"?
You're a formidable opponent Lady Penelope, more than a match for most men.
That's not saying much then, is it?
